divs: Sighting Detailsokay, so im walking down the street at about 6:30pm. the night was dark enough to see the stars so i looked around. ahead of me was a birght star that seemed to be very close. i thought to myself, "huh, i've never seen that star before." i watched it for a few seconds, and then it disappeared. my jaw dropped. 'No way!' iwas in shock. and then it came back, and i felt a rush of adrenelin. oh my god. i will never forget what happened. it flashed about 4 more times, and then i think it started to tavel south. while it was moving, it started to blink. it soon became out of sight not soon after.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lomita
There were no other sightings in Lomita on or around November 17th 2010
